page.title: 02Blakesley Primary School.
page.content: Blakesley school is a small school, one part of which dates back to 1669, when it was Foxley Trust Boys School. In 1913 two more classes were built and girls joined. Later, in 1974 a new school hall was built. There are about 106 children today and 5 teachers. We have two cleaning ladies, a secretary and an ancillary who helps the teachers.The school is made up of a main building and two extra classrooms that used to be a canteen until the new hall was built.You can have school dinners, bring sandwiches or go home for lunch.The school is well equiped with a modern computer and audio visual aids.In a week, we get 25 hours of work and 8.75hours of playtimes each week.My best subjects are art and sport and we also do language,reading,mathematics, project and music.When we go home,we might go by bus or walk if we live near
